pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/prometheus
pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/kube-controller-manager
pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/kube-scheduler
pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/kwok-controller
pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/kube-apiserver
pkill ~/.kwok/clusters/<CLUSTER_NAME>/bin/etcd
